subject: Alcoholic Beverages
Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: In October 1999, 9-year-old Antonia Verni was paralyzed in an accident involving a football fan who drank 14 beers at Giants Stadium.
snippet: In October 1999, 9-year-old Antonia Verni was paralyzed in an accident involving a football fan who drank 14 beers at Giants Stadium.
